website_summaries.verdict: A fun toy that looks cute and hatches as expected in most cases. Rare occurrences of hatch failure have been disappointing, however.
pros: Builds anticipation as it takes about an hour to hatch
Toy that hatches is either bright blue or purple with looks kids love
They also enjoy its interactive responses
cons: Some reports of faulty Hatchimals that never made their way out of the shells

customer_reviews.title: Grandaughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grandaughter for her birthday.. was not sure about it because of mixed reviews. .. she was really excited when she opened it.. so while she was opening up her presents everyone passed it around and patted it and rubbed it.. then she got it back and it cracked and hatched for her.. it was a lot of fun even for the adults to watch.. it was a huge hit.. and then it sang happy birthday to her when it hatched.. I was surprised it hatched so quickly. but that is what made it so special .. because we all got to enjoy it hatching...
customer_reviews.author: S. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy, got it for my 5 year olds ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute toy, got it for my 5 year olds birthday she loves it. With in a week it stopped making noise and the spinmaster company and it is sending out a new one no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Smith

customer_reviews.title: The toy was great fun and it was just as fun watching the ...
customer_reviews.text: The toy was great fun and it was just as fun watching the kids' excitement. The only downside was that as soon as the kids nurtured it to whatever stage it was supposed to be nurtured to, they set it down and never picked it back up again. Expensive toy now collects dust.
customer_reviews.author: SDMom

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it. Me? It's furby in an egg.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R. King

customer_reviews.title: My daughter was super excited to get this toy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was super excited to get this toy, but it's pretty boring and she lost interest quickly, as I expected she would. It was worth it to see how happy she was but it was not an efficient allocation of $$$ :-p
customer_reviews.author: Flav

customer_reviews.title: The one I bought is perfect. Hatched as it was supposed to
customer_reviews.text: I took so long to buy this because I had read about them not working. The one I bought is perfect. Hatched as it was supposed to. My daughter adores it. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H

customer_reviews.title: So fun! My daughter loved it and I've actually had ...
customer_reviews.text: So fun! My daughter loved it and I've actually had quite a bit of fun with it also! I didn't realize there was so much more to them after they hatch.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Crider

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved it! I was just disappointed a bit by ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it! I was just disappointed a bit by how fast it "grew". Within 3 hours,my 9 year old had pretty much maxed out the toys capabilities. Overall though, fun toy and she was super excited about it. P.s. shipping was on time and quick!
customer_reviews.author: Jamilynne

customer_reviews.title: Awesome to watch hatch
customer_reviews.text: The hatchimal worked as described. It took about an hour for it hatch. My daughter was impatient and eventually just peeled the cracked egg off. The instructions for teaching it are easy to follow but if u have an inpatient child this may not be a good toy.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Keller

customer_reviews.title: Overrated but the kids love it
customer_reviews.text: I can not seem to understand the high price tag for this item. I ordered it for our daughter for Christmas and we were all disappointed when the thing wouldn’t hatch. I did some research and found that it was a common problem. I had to reach out to the Spinmaster company to rectify the situation. What a hassle that was. They had me send it back and sent a new one a few weeks later. Thank god the new one hatched. The only reason I gave three stars is because despite all the issues our daughter loves this overrated overpriced toy.
customer_reviews.author: Lemon

customer_reviews.title: We purcbased 2. One was as expected, although ...
customer_reviews.text: We purcbased 2. One was as expected, although we did have to help get the hatchimal out bc after an hour of playing with the egg, it still wasnt fully breaking through. The 2nd did not unbox properly. The piece in the bottom that needs to come out to activate it did not come out, and broke off inside the hatchimal. We tr odd using pliers to twist it and get it out just as the other one did, but nothing worked. We had to break open the egg ourselves.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for my six year old granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved this. She received it on her sixth birthday. Her favorite part is recording her voice and the Hatchimal repeating it back in the Hatchimals voice.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: COMPANY DOESN'T BACK THE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: If I could I would not even give it one star. We bought this for our granddaughter for her birthday, its all she wanted (that's why she asked grandpa) Anyhow when she got it she took it home and it never worked, we tried replacing the battery's but yet nothing work. Couldn't send it back right away because her dad threw away the box. We have sent the company several emails, my daughter in law has sent emails and yet nobody will contact us. So now we are stuck with this one that doesn't work and out the money. ITS ALL SHE WANTED AND NOW SHE HAS NOTHING.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J Mateer

customer_reviews.title: The coolest toy ever!
customer_reviews.text: Why didn't they have toys like this when I was young? I got these Hatchimals for my 6-year-old niece and watching her reaction was worth every penny. The egg begins to shake and pecking sounds can be heard as anticipation builds -- is this a boy (blue) or a girl (pink). (Ours was blue but my forward-thinking niece quickly dubbed it a girl!) The sound effects were awesome and once the "chick" emerges -- with some fanfare -- different colors and sounds reveal if it's hungry, tired, grouchy and so forth. It's a totally amazing toy and a great experience for adults to watch!
customer_reviews.author: Jill I. Shtulman

customer_reviews.title: Got the blue one with yellow belly Super cute. So much cuter than I thought it ...
customer_reviews.text: YES. All is well. Got the blue one with yellow belly Super cute. So much cuter than I thought it would be. Reminds me of furbys from back in the day just re-born a different way. They will also repeat things you teach them to say which is a fun touch. these things are friggen cute so glad I finally gave in and spent the money to get this ... your kill will love. Hatching took a little longer than expected so be patient. Once that part is over, your kid will love.
customer_reviews.author: Shop Am

customer_reviews.title: Used
customer_reviews.text: I only gave it two stars because my six year old was so excited to get one. She opened it for her birthday and it was already hatched. She was extremely disappointed. And then when we took it out of the box it fell out of the egg. If you have every seen one of these you have to pull it pretty hard from the egg. It was very clear that this was a used hatchimal. I told my daughter I was going to return it and she started crying. So needless to say - I’m keeping a used toy for the sake of not ruining her birthday. Extremely upset I spent this much money on a used toy.
customer_reviews.author: Love For Books

customer_reviews.title: fast delivery great product
customer_reviews.text: Such a neat toy and great price for the product, grand daughter loves it! bigger then I expected..
customer_reviews.author: lena

customer_reviews.title: Whew... found one.  Thank You!
customer_reviews.text: I was so glad to find one of these extremely hard to find Christmas items and my granddaughter was overjoyed. She just couldn't believe I actually found one! I was getting a little scared though having ordered it on Cyber Monday and it got here just in the week before Christmas. But that's OK, it got here in time. That said, as for me, there's not much product here for the money. My Granddaughter would disagree.
customer_reviews.author: Modern FossilTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These Hatchimals are a lot of fun, we bought our first one for our 5yo daughter and I couldbt believe how loud she yelled when it started to hatch. You will not be dissapointed with these, they are not overly loud, and seem to have a great build quality. NOTE: you have to put SERIOUS power into removing it from the egg base!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Boyd

customer_reviews.title: instructions in the package weren't the best..
customer_reviews.text: instructions in the package weren't the best...we went to You Tube for better instructions. The hatching event my daughter loved...
customer_reviews.author: Mark Welch

customer_reviews.title: I feel I need a replacement Hatchimal or another one to make up the difference to my daughter who does not seem that interested in it like she first was
customer_reviews.text: I think the hatchimal talks in Chinese...? Not anywhere in the description does it say what language it speaks. However, I can tell you that it does not speak English. It won't say the correct words, and I assumed when I paid $68 that it would at least communicate in our own language since I am purchasing it from America where English is the primary language. If it is speaking a different language, please write that somewhere in the description. I probably would have chosen the penguela instead. I feel I need a replacement Hatchimal or another one to make up the difference to my daughter who does not seem that interested in it like she first was.
customer_reviews.author: Kason Prince

customer_reviews.title: My daughter adores it. She baned it pearl
customer_reviews.text: Well made, well packaged, my daughter loves it!!! Well worth the price. The only thing thing was it hatched so fast, when we got it, it was ready to hatch, I was hoping the incubation period would have lasted no longer.
customer_reviews.author: darnise

customer_reviews.title: We had an impossible time getting it to hatch. ...
customer_reviews.text: We had an impossible time getting it to hatch. Took hours on Christmas morning. Didn't do anything inside the shell really that it said it should. Had to look up you tube videos on how to get it to hatch. My Daughter was devastated that it took so long, we had to rapidly shake it side to side to activate hatching then it would quit & we had to start again rapidly shaking it. Not enjoyable, magical hatching experience my 6 year old was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Angie E

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t live up to the hype
customer_reviews.text: These are one of those toys your kid begs for and then plays with it for two days and doesn’t touch it again.. they’re cute but I think all the different moods and colors are too much to remember for little kids and then they become uninterested. I think they could definitely be cheaper not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: kristen

customer_reviews.title: Decent enough for a dedicated present
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected, but didn't know what to expect. Daughter is 5, and i think she's too young for this toy at this price. Working on it, but idk, not a huge fan? but seeing her reaction and the process the toy takes to hatch and all...would be a great toy for a slightly older child who loves to take care of animals.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe this thing is still working!
customer_reviews.text: My kids have treated this thing terribly up to and including accidentally hitting me in the face and splitting my eyebrow open (complete with gushing blood). They've dropped it, thrown it, had tugs of war and on and on. It still works, perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Steve and Laura Andrews

customer_reviews.title: I have bought a lot this month. I had ...
customer_reviews.text: I have bought a lot this month. I had problems with the first order.hatchanimals I ckd you, you said another hatch mils was on its way. Hatch mils didn't come. On record you want me to send hatch mils back. Silly to say. And why take a toddlers hatch am I'll . Now I try to call about the problem, your operator can't pull my address up. What a mess. Mary L. Linton mll200557@gmail.com
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everyone was involved in the hatching and my grandson was delighted with the toy that was hatched
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my grandson. It was a hit. Everyone was involved in the hatching and my grandson was delighted with the toy that was hatched.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daughter (5) wanted one of these so bad, so we got it for her for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: My daughter (5) wanted one of these so bad, so we got it for her for Christmas. The initial excitement of it hatching was a lot of fun and she played with it for a couple days, but lost interest quickly. I think the product itself is fun and cute, but for us I feel it was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kierra Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Needs volume control
customer_reviews.text: The kids absolutely love this and would probably give it 10 stars. Mom on the other hand is only giving it 4 because there is no volume control. It is either on or off and on is VERY loud. Otherwise it is a great product. performed to our expectations and the kids loved seeing them hatch.
customer_reviews.author: M. Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, except it didn't want to hatch on its own.
customer_reviews.author: ryan alder

customer_reviews.title: ... it is very expensive toy however it is very fun and great way to teach kids how to hatch
customer_reviews.text: Even though it is very expensive toy however it is very fun and great way to teach kids how to hatch. We were all very excited to play with it and learn how to sooth our newborn hatchimal. It is really fun we are in love with even after hatching
customer_reviews.author: BinTamim

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Toy/Product - Doesn't talk
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was so excited to receive this as a gift from Santclaus. She carefully opened the gift and had it hatched. It went through various stages but did not make any noises or utter words. After 2 days of having it, and going through lot of online videos we realized we might have received a faulty hatchimal. The toy changes eye colors, flaps the wings and walks but that's about it nothing more than that. Looks like one other customer had same issue below. Totally Disppointed.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Fun, for maybe an hour...
customer_reviews.text: It is cute, but IMO these things are just not worth the price tag. Son was impressed during the hatch but otherwise totally bored with this toy. Yawn
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Mom

customer_reviews.title: Hatches well, unlike some stories I've heard. Hatched by itself!
customer_reviews.text: I've heard these won't hatch on their own very well but this hatched completely on its own for us and rather quickly actually with not much interaction at all really. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars was because not that fun after it hatches cause my child hasn't played with it since the day we got it.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: annoying as ****
customer_reviews.text: As an adult, annoying as ****. Also I don't understand why it is so expensive. The tech in this is not much different then a furby my daughter loves it though. If it were like a $20 toy (As it should be), I'd give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: cute little toy. Family had fun hatching it.
customer_reviews.text: The entire family had fun hatching and playing with this thing. Cute toy but once hatched it does not go back to do it again. After the you have a clap activated toy.
customer_reviews.author: Leif Ericksen

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter was very happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter's sixth birthday and she loves it! Interactive toy that hatches.

customer_reviews.title: They are a bit like Furbies, except that they don't lean quite as ...
customer_reviews.text: They are a bit like Furbies, except that they don't lean quite as well. These hatched properly and work very well. I feel like the batteries get drained a little too fast though. So 4 stars instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Best

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but cute!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved it. He was so excited when he opened the box and saw it. He said he'd been wanting one "for years and years". (He's 5) It was probably his favorite birthday surprise.
customer_reviews.author: dwlbooks

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Hatchimals for my granddaughter and she loved it. We had ordered it just a couple of days before her birthday and received it in enough time. She loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Chastity Adams

customer_reviews.title: My kids went nuts when this thing hatched. It's ...
customer_reviews.text: My kids went nuts when this thing hatched. It's really cute. At first I thought it was a bit pricey but changed my mind once I saw how much they could do with it!
customer_reviews.author: Jewelry Lover

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: Biggest waste of money ever. After it “hatches” there’s no more excitement. Save your coins. Your kid does not need this toy. It is not life changing. They will get over it in a week.
customer_reviews.author: Sbb14

customer_reviews.title: High price for the time the kids played with them
customer_reviews.text: The kids were very excited watch hatch, it took about 40 minutes. But they have played with since . It was a lot of expense for 45 minutes to an hour.
customer_reviews.author: LesD

customer_reviews.title: Nice product!
customer_reviews.text: Made of good material quality, this is a very well-made, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: OzzieVald

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loved it! Is it worth the price, probably not but are any of the "latest fad" toys? Parents and Grandparents just have to bite the bullet and pay up if they want to create the memory of a child getting "just what they wanted".
customer_reviews.author: G. L. Iagulli

customer_reviews.title: My niece literally want crazy when I got this for ...
customer_reviews.text: My niece literally want crazy when I got this for her at Christmas. Waiting for it to hatch had the whole family excited. Seriously, it was mostly adults and we were all more entertained than my niece. This thing is a feat of engineering.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: My 4yr old kid loves it. Takes a ridiculous ...
customer_reviews.text: My 4yr old kid loves it. Takes a ridiculous amount of time to hatch, and you should absolutely google reviews and tips. My kid didn’t put it down for hours... going on days actually
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod Beard

customer_reviews.title: They loved them( my 6 and 4 year old granddaughters) And ...
customer_reviews.text: They loved them( my 6 and 4 year old granddaughters) And they are still playing with them a month later!
customer_reviews.author: kscon

customer_reviews.title: return policy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a Christmas present, need to return it but can't. they say I needed to return it by 11/16.
customer_reviews.author: Joann D. Long

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for 7 year granddaughter's birthday
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter was so excited to get this her hands were shaking from excitement! It made my day! And she still loves it even after all the hoopla of the birthday party is over!
customer_reviews.author: V. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Works well, kid happy.
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves it, he said it was number 1 on his Christmas list this year. The look of excitement in his face as he opened the package, and as it goes through all it's stages was well worth the price.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than anywhere else
customer_reviews.text: These little things aren’t cheap. Best price I could find

customer_reviews.title: Took forever to crack and once it did it didn’t ...
customer_reviews.text: Took forever to crack and once it did it didn’t crack the whole thing for the hatchimal to come out. It kept getting stuck in a spot. We had to crack it open by hand eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and she loves it. Came in quick too!
customer_reviews.author: S.L.

customer_reviews.title: Too Expensive
customer_reviews.text: My nieces loved them. The six year old was thrilled, but the four year old did not get the concept.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Ours never worked properly. My daughter tried to play with it for a half an hour then forgot about it. Somewhere isn a toy box now.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed little girl
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed.... Order this for my daughter birthday and when we received this product and she opened it for her birthday the egg was already cracked so guess what no cracking of the hatchimal happened here.... My daughter was so upset all she could do was cry.... Wont be making that mistake again...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Hatch, OK Afterward
customer_reviews.text: Worked as advertised, our 8-year-old twins each got a Hatchimal and loved the hatching process. Not so interactive afterward, but I knew that.
customer_reviews.author: erco

customer_reviews.title: One fun feature after it hatches
customer_reviews.text: My son really enjoys the feature where the hatchimal repeats what you say. Other than that the thrill faded quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Z

customer_reviews.title: Our son liked this. It is very cool how the "hatchee" ...
customer_reviews.text: Our son liked this. It is very cool how the "hatchee" hatches. My only complaint would be how quickly the bird (in our case) "grows up". The stages advance rather quickly and before you know it, it's a "grade-schooler" or whatever the last stage is. If you're not expecting variety for very long, this is a fun toy.
customer_reviews.author: James R Hunter II

customer_reviews.title: My little brother loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and my brother loves playing with it. I ordered another one to gift for one of the kids in our family, excellent gift! Thank you Hatchimals!

customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old daughter was not impressed. I don’t quite understand the hype. Certainly not worth the money.

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: I paid $50 for 24 hours of fun! It’s a cool toy but my kid only noticed this thing for maybe 24hrs then it was off the a new adventure

customer_reviews.title: Hatchimals
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these products for my daughter for Christmas. She absolutely loves them and would recommend for the price.

customer_reviews.title: but the granddaughters love them. Hot item at Christmas
customer_reviews.text: I personally think these are way over priced, but the granddaughters love them. Hot item at Christmas.

customer_reviews.title: but my 5 year old lost interest pretty quick. Perhaps better for older kids
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced everywhere, but what can you do? Works as expected, but my 5 year old lost interest pretty quick. Perhaps better for older kids, like 7 or 8?

customer_reviews.title: Fun to play
customer_reviews.text: My niece had a great time watching it hatch. Took about 20 minutes, which was faster than I thought. She’s still having fun almost a month later. Big hit.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Happiest Grandkid ever- and I got to watch it hatch! Love it!

customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it and I loved that I didn't have to stalk Toys R Us to get it.

customer_reviews.title: Fun Toy

customer_reviews.text: Hatched great. She loved it for about a week. Now it just sits.

customer_reviews.title: How cute.

customer_reviews.title: Twist the locks a bunch!!
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you twist the locks on the bottom several times each before removing. We didn't and the thing wouldn't turn on. It was a pain to get the holes all lined up again to reinsert them and try to activate it. Eventually got it though.
customer_reviews.author: kerrie bertelsen

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved it. So did I! Lots of squeals as it hatched. Amazing! Then the light color change. Then the sounds. I had no idea what to expect! He did! Worth the money. He is 4 1/2. I want my own. He was very happy it was blue.

customer_reviews.title: Noisy but fun.

customer_reviews.text: This was a huge hit with our granddaughter, and our dog Lucy enjoyed eating the egg!

customer_reviews.text: It hatched and likes to repeat words and babble about stuff. Kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: The hatchimal was a Christmas gift for my daughter. ...
customer_reviews.text: The hatchimal was a Christmas gift for my daughter. She loves playing with it and how it interacts with her. My only complaint would be the price. I feel it is priced at bit high for what it does.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Revilla

customer_reviews.title: This is not the twin Hatchimal Toy although it's shown with 2 offspring
customer_reviews.text: Beware!! there is a 20% restocking fee! I bought this toy for my granddaughter thinking it was the twin Hatchimal set since the picture shows two offspring and one egg! Wrong! It's only one offspring. The picture is totally misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Lablover

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are great. I gave them as a gift and the kids can't get enough of it.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Knadler

customer_reviews.title: 6 year old boy VERY happy!!
customer_reviews.text: Such a weird toy, but my 6 year old (boy) LOVES it. He got it for Christmas yesterday and hasn't put it down. It's actually a great idea for a kid who wants a pet but may not be ready for one yet. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Laura J

customer_reviews.title: Ordered this for my Granddaughter for Christmas. As soon ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my Granddaughter for Christmas. As soon as she opened it, it hatched and there was only 1. It did not contain twins and the whole process was over in 5 minutes. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Paige Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves this and remains intrigued still a month later.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and very life like!
customer_reviews.text: These animals are so very cute and it was very exciting when they started to hatch on Christmas Eve ...
customer_reviews.author: Btrandell

customer_reviews.title: Only one creature came out Not Two like shown in photo
customer_reviews.text: Only one creature came out Not Two like shown in photo! Very disappointed when my Granddaughter opened it! She wanted to give one tO her best friend and only one came out ! F I her D L
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Got two of these right when we opened them they started to hatch, didn’t even get time to enjoy them in the egg stage, kids were said they didn’t get to help them hatch
customer_reviews.author: Alex Wright

product_meta.title: Hatchimals Glittering Garden, Hatching Egg, Interactive Creature – Shimmering Draggle by Spin Master
product_meta.description: Hatchimals glittering garden is the newest hatch batch straight out of hatchtopia! Who's inside? It's a surprise! Each sparkling egg contains one of two interactive Hatchimals with twinkling wings and soft, shimmering fur. Love and care for yours inside the egg and its eyes will light up as it makes cute sounds, telling you how it's feeling! Once you've played with the egg enough, you'll see rainbow eyes - that means it's time to hatch! Hatchimals can't hatch on their own. Your touch encourages them to Peck their way out of the egg! It's a once-in-a-lifetime experience! Now you get to raise your glittering Hatchimal through 3 stages, from baby to toddler, to kid. Your Hatchimal sings “Hatchy birthday” each time it enters a new Stage! Teach yours to walk, dance, play games and more! It will even repeat what you say in its own voice! Hatchimals glittering garden — who will you hatch?
feature_bullets: Hatchimals live inside of eggs. Who's inside? It's a surprise! Hold them to hear their heartbeats, flip them for fun, tap and they'll tap back! Hatchimals can't hatch without you!
When you see rainbow eyes from inside the egg, your Hatchimal is ready to hatch! They need your help — encourage it with your touch as it really pecks out of its egg!
Out of egg, it's time to raise your glittery Hatchimal through 3 stages. Teach your cute Hatchimal to walk, talk, dance, play games and more!
Hatchimals glittering garden are for ages 5+ and requires 2 AA batteries (included).
Includes: 1 Hatchimal glittering garden, 1 instruction booklet, 1 reference guide, 2 AA batteries
